text:
If you're at #KBW25, join us at the Stable Stage today for CEO Veronika Kapustina's (@v_kapustina on X) keynote.

We'll dive into TON Strategy Co.'s ($TONX) investment thesis on $TON, the power of a billion user distribution platform, and why we chose $TON as the sole crypto asset for our digital asset treasury.Â 

Full conference schedule: https://conference.playfablo.com/en/conference/KBW/session/2025-09-23
